paragraphs: Our efforts to expand across the Daggerfall Covenant must continue. Newly discovered Ayleid ruins along the coast make it imperative that we capture key areas of land. Take a team of warriors, take control of the site, and send word back on what you find. There might be something useful hidden within the ruins. At the very least, we will gain a new base of operations.
Our best armsmaster, trained in the art of the thundermaul, will accompany you to provide additional muscle.
